extendedInfo.description: This is a tool for testing if you device has root access and verifying if it does. This tool also gives you system information about your device including model number, device name and manufacturer.This application will not root your device but serves as a tool to verify your root access. When you run the application if you get a check mark this means you have root access and if you get an 'X' you do not. I can not guarantee that the application will be 100% accurate. If you have any questions or need to contact me you can get ahold of me on my website CMDann.ca I appreciate your feedback.I have tested it on the following devices with success:-Samsung Galaxy S3 (rooted)-Samsung Galaxy S3 (unrooted)-Nexus 7 (rooted)-Nexus 7 (unrooted)-Samsung Galaxy S2 (rooted)-Samsung Captivate (unrooted)-Sony Xperia Arc (rooted)-Motorola Xoom (Rooted)-MK 802 (Rooted)-MK802 II (unrooted)-Bluestacks Emulator (unrooted)************************************************************************************I would like to give credit to Adam of XDA-Developers for his Shell code.I would also like to thank Grandel Cuvos as my offical beta tester.Thank you to everybody who has submitted feedback on here and on my site.This is an open source application and you can grab the code here:https://github.com/CMDann/Root-Checker

reviews.title: Nice simple and to the point
reviews.comment: Only one thing, why does it need Full Network Access?? Tested and working on Huawei P1/U9200 on JB 4.1.1

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Every other app I\'ve downloaded took entirely too long. This was 0.2seconds. BRAVO!
reviews.author: Faye Starling

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: It works fine with my Micromax Funbook P275. This is the worlds best app for checking devices.
reviews.author: Nityananda Pradhan

reviews.title: works as advertised
reviews.comment: handy little tool. worked fine on my new mk802IIIs
reviews.author: Richard Cummings

reviews.title: GREAT! :D
reviews.comment: Great! Just what I needed. Thank you (:
